analysis.description:
Crowdsale.startTime (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#398) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- validPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#449-459)

Reentrancy in BETHERTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#541-570):
	External calls:
	- newTokens = addBonusTokens(token.totalSupply(),newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#559-560)
	- tokensWouldAddTo = newTokens.add(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#560-561)
	- token.mint(_buyer,newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#561-562)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#564)
empty in BethereumERC223.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#146) is a local variable never initialiazed

BETHERTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#541-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_buyer,newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#561-562)

BETHERTokenSale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,toMint) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol)

BETHERTokenSale.mintRawTokens (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#535-539) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_buyer,_newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#539)

BethereumERC223.name.name (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#192) shadows:
	- BethereumERC223.name (function @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#189-193)

BethereumERC223.symbol.symbol (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#197) shadows:
	- BethereumERC223.symbol (function @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#193-197)

BethereumERC223.decimals.decimals (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#198) shadows:
	- BethereumERC223.decimals (function @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#198-199)

Reentrancy in BETHERTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#541-570):
	External calls:
	- newTokens = addBonusTokens(token.totalSupply(),newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#559-560)
	- tokensWouldAddTo = newTokens.add(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#560-561)
	- token.mint(_buyer,newTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#561-562)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#566)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiCapReached (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#569)

BethereumERC223.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#241-257)
	- /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#248-255
Crowdsale.startTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#398)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x14c926f2290044b647e1bf2072e67b495eff1905.sol#265:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
